On Feb 25, 2005, at 8:13 AM, Stephanie Lowe wrote:
b) The breeder won't gas the dog if you don't buy it. Let someone else buy the overpriced, inbred, retarded dog.
Ouch! You must have been a Catholic Mom in a previous life! Nothing like a little guilt there Dan.
For guilt trips, see my brother. He's one step removed from PETA anti-fur activist.
No nasty surprises like Oreo? Ask Dan about the last cat he picked out at the pound. The 6 year old mute cat that turned out to be the loudest cat that was just barley out of being a kitten! 

This one...

http://ingeni.us/img/oreo2.jpg
Labeled at the pound as 5-6 years old. Meowed without making any noise. I didn't notice he still had his claws. I thought, wow, a nice quiet middle-aged cat. Perfect.
He settled in quickly and is a maniac. Runs around the house at top speed for no reason, and makes more noise than any other cat I've known (remember I thought he was a mute). Apparently he was just meowing at a pitch higher than I could hear. The vet said he was probably a year old, if that. 

 -dan
